fr.irit.smac.amak

Class Agent<A extends Amas<E>,E extends Environment>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.irit.smac.amak.Agent<A,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - The kind of Amas the agent refers to
    E - The kind of Environment the agent AND the Amas refer to
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AntExample, AsyncAntExample, AsyncTest.MyAgent, CommunicatingAgent, PhilosopherExample, ScalibilityTest.MyAgent, ThreadTest.MyAgent

    public abstract class Agent<A extends Amas<E>,E extends Environment>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class must be overridden by all agents
    Author:
    Alexandre Perles

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Agent.Phase
      These phases are used to synchronize agents on phase

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected A amas
      Amas the agent belongs to
      protected java.util.Map<Agent<A,E>,java.lang.Double> criticalities
      Criticalities of the neighbors (and it self) as perceived at the beginning of the agent's cycle
      protected Agent.Phase currentPhase
      The current phase of the agent Agent.Phase
      protected java.util.List<Agent<A,E>> neighborhood
      Neighborhood of the agent (must refer to the same couple amas, environment
      protected java.lang.Object[] params
      The parameters that can be user in the initialization process onInitialization()

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Agent(A amas, java.lang.Object... params)
      The constructor automatically add the agent to the corresponding amas and initialize the agent

      protected void onRenderingInitialization()
      Called to initialize the rendering of the agent
      protected void onSystemCycleBegin()
      Deprecated. 
      This method is useless because the state of the agent is not supposed to evolve before or after its cycle. Use OnAgentCycleBegin/End instead. This method is final because it must not be implemented. Implement it will have no effect.
      protected void onSystemCycleEnd()
      Deprecated. 
      This method is useless because the state of the agent is not supposed to evolve before or after its cycle. Use OnAgentCycleBegin/End instead. This method is final because it must not be implemented. Implement it will have no effect.

      This method should be used to update the representation of the agent for example in a VUI

    • Method Detail

      • addNeighbor

        @SafeVarargs
public final void addNeighbor(Agent<A,E>... agents)
        Add neighbors to the agent
        Parameters:
        agents - The list of agent that should be considered as neighbor

      • computeCriticality

        protected double computeCriticality()
        This method must be overridden by the agents. This method shouldn't make any calls to internal representation an agent has on its environment because these information maybe outdated.
        Returns:
        the criticality at a given moment

      • setAsynchronous

        protected void setAsynchronous()

      • computeExecutionOrderLayer

        protected int computeExecutionOrderLayer()
        This method must be overriden if you need to specify an execution order layer
        Returns:
        the execution order layer

      • onAgentCycleBegin

        protected void onAgentCycleBegin()
        This method is called at the beginning of an agent's cycle

        protected void onAgentCycleEnd()
        This method is called at the end of an agent's cycle

      • onPerceive

        protected void onPerceive()
        This method corresponds to the perception phase of the agents and must be overridden

      • onDecide

        protected void onDecide()
        This method corresponds to the decision phase of the agents and must be overridden

      • onAct

        protected void onAct()
        This method corresponds to the action phase of the agents and must be overridden

      • onExpose

        protected void onExpose()
        In this method the agent should expose some variables with its neighbor

      • onUpdateRender

        protected void onUpdateRender()
        This method should be used to update the representation of the agent for example in a VUI

      • onDraw

        @Deprecated
protected final void onDraw()
        Deprecated. Must be replaced by onUpdateRender()
        This method is now deprecated and should be replaced by onUpdateRender

      • onReady

        protected void onReady()
        Called when all initial agents have been created and are ready to be started

      • _onBeforeReady

        protected final void _onBeforeReady()
        Called by the framework when all initial agents have been created and are almost ready to be started

      • onInitialization

        protected void onInitialization()
        Called before all agents are created

      • onInitialize

        @Deprecated
protected final void onInitialize()
        Deprecated. Must be replaced by onInitialization()
        Replaced by onInitialization

      • onRenderingInitialization

        protected void onRenderingInitialization()
        Called to initialize the rendering of the agent

      • onSystemCycleBegin

        @Deprecated
protected final void onSystemCycleBegin()
        Deprecated. This method is useless because the state of the agent is not supposed to evolve before or after its cycle. Use OnAgentCycleBegin/End instead. This method is final because it must not be implemented. Implement it will have no effect.

      • onSystemCycleEnd

        @Deprecated
protected final void onSystemCycleEnd()
        Deprecated. This method is useless because the state of the agent is not supposed to evolve before or after its cycle. Use OnAgentCycleBegin/End instead. This method is final because it must not be implemented. Implement it will have no effect.

      • run

        public void run()
        This method is called automatically and corresponds to a full cycle of an agent
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

        public void onePhaseCycle()

        protected final void phase2()
        This method represents the decisionAndAction phase of the agent

      • _computeExecutionOrder

        protected int _computeExecutionOrder()
        Compute the execution order from the layer and a random value. This method shouldn't be overridden.
        Returns:
        A number used by amak to determine which agent executes first

      • onDecideAndAct

        protected void onDecideAndAct()
        Decide and act These two phases can often be grouped

      • getMostCriticalNeighbor

        protected final Agent<A,E> getMostCriticalNeighbor(boolean includingMe)
        Convenient method giving the most critical neighbor at a given moment
        Parameters:
        includingMe - Should the agent also consider its own criticality
        Returns:
        the most critical agent
